Joyce Leswana Kgoali (13 Jenụwarị na afọ 1950, 21 Nọvemba na afọ 2004) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Onye otu African National Congress, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke National Council of Provinces site na Mee, na afọ 2004 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Nọvemba na afọ 2004
Ọ bụ onye otu Executive Council na gọọmentị mpaghara Gauteng site na afo 1998 ruo na afọ 1999 na onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu nke ANC n'etiti afọ 2002 na afọ 2004.
A mụrụ Kgoali na 13 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1950 na Basutoland (nke bụ Lesotho ugbu a).
Kgoali bụ onye otu ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ akwa. Ọ bụ onye otu United Democratic Front mgbe ọ na-etinye aka na Federation of Transvaal Women O mechara sonye na African National Congress Women's League
Kgoali na-arụsi ọrụ ike na netwọk nzuzo nke pati ahụ.

Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 1994 gasịrị, Kgoali ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Senate, nke ghọrọ National Council of Provinces na afọ 1997. Onye isi ala Gauteng bụ Mathole Motshekga họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ MEC maka Transport na afọ 1998. Ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe ntuli aka afọ 1999 gasịrị.
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke pati ahụ. A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke National Council of Provinces na Mee na afọ 2004 mgbe ntuli aka Eprel na afọ 2004 gasịrị.
Kgoali nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu sitere na ịwa ahụ na 21 Nọvemba na afọ 2004. Ọ dị afọ 54
N'oge ahụ, ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka mba nke otu ụmụ nwanyị nke ANC na onye otu kọmpụta na-ahụkarị mpaghara Gauteng ANC. Di ya na ụmụ ya hapụrụ ya.
